meanings.definition: A polymer composed of identical repeating units.
meanings.sent1: Homopolymers are chains made of the same building blocks.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study homopolymers to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with colorful homopolymers, each one unique.
meanings.sent4: In the world of homopolymers, every link in the chain is a mirror image of the next.
meanings.sent5: The factory produced homopolymers in various shapes and sizes.

meanings.definition: Polymers made up of the same type of monomer.
meanings.sent1: Chemists use homopolymers in many different applications.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in creating homopolymers for industrial use.
meanings.sent3: At the polymer party, all the homopolymers danced together in harmony.
meanings.sent4: The homopolymers in nature mimic the patterns of the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The artist sculpted a beautiful statue using colorful homopolymers.
